name: DirExe
short_description:
If you need a server that monitors certain directories and processes new/all files accordingly, you can use DirExe.
Each configured directory gets a thread that processes incoming files with a special "Processor" plugin. Supplied are processors for moving files, executing system commands, and mailing files. You can write your own plugin or modify existing.

Features:
- monitor multiple directories
- include/exclude file filters
- move/copy/rename files
- mail files as attachment or as body
- execute files
- use template variables (name, extension, date..)
- plugin framework
summary: Processes files in directories (mail, move, execute...)
